column1:
The overall positive sentiment percentages for Cleaniness, Amenities, Location, Services and General were 35.02%, 48.89%, 52.72%, 47.84% and 49.30% respectively.

Suggestions for improvement: 
1. Cleaniness: Increase the positive sentiment by boosting the cleaniness through training the staff better. 
2. Amenities: Highlight the existing amenities even more and introduce additional amenities to further boost the positive sentiment. 
3. Location: Improve the availability of public transport and highlight the nearby attractions to boost the positive sentiment for the location. 
4. Services: Introduce additional services and provide better customer service to improve the positive sentiment for services. 
5. General: Increase awareness and publicity of the brand through different marketing campaigns and providing offers to boost the general positive sentiment.
